title: A Young Man Sitting on a Stool Reading a Book (recto); The Fall of Man (a fragment of the lower part) (verso)
medium: pen and brown ink heightened with white gouache on laid paper (recto); black chalk with brown ink (verso)
attribution: Florentine 15th Century (possibly Domenico Veneziano or Luca della Robbia)
creditline: William B. O'Neal Fund and Ailsa Mellon Bruce Fund
